name: blogfeed
label: Blog Feed URL
description: The URL for the blog feed that is used on the homepage.

name: themecolor
label: Theme Colors
description: The color palette used for the theme.
input_value: [('gold-grey-purple','Gold, grey, and purple'),('maroon-blue-grey','Blue, maroon, and grey')]

name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.
